description: The Robber-Baron is pompous and proud, although neither his armies nor his castles are to speak of. He lives up to his title though - be wary of his raids! He will not hesitate to set his knights on your people.
taunt_1: Ha! Stand in awe! My brave warriors will put an end to your tyranny!
taunt_2: My men are clothed in the gowns of uprightness - you cannot resist them!
taunt_3: Did you really believe you could resist ME? Well, of course you canNOT. But see for yourselves...
taunt_4: To this day I will end the sad tale of your existence! Make your peace!
anger_1: Today's triumph is without significance for this cause. Other means I know of will lead us to victory!
anger_2: You are well advised to display your malice. After all, VILLAINS are essential to knights - when they become HEROES!
plead: It gives me pain that I could not turn the tables. Such a cruel world, in which heroes succumb to evildoers!
nervous_1: Ha! Do come! I will teach you a lesson you will never forget!
nervous_2: No matter how many men of yours go into battle - I am not afraid! Today you will learn what it means to encounter a TRUE knight!
victory_1: Did you really believe you could oppose the bold courage of my men? Let this defeature be a lesson to you!
victory_3: A defeat through a BETTER man is no disgrace. You have fought well... merely not well enough.
victory_4: I triumph anew! This victory will go down in history!
request: My supply lines have been broken! You will account for the damage!
thanks: Your bounty brings honour - I thank you very much, my lord.
ally_death: I have always fought for you on the frontline! Miserable wretch! You should have covered my back!
congrats: Congratulations! A glorious victory! I very much hope you will not forget to appreciate my contribution to this success!
boast: The despot's jowls are in a glow, does sacrilege him contempt show. Thus in darkness was he slain, my knights imposed upon him pain...!
help: My troops are scattered! I cannot defend myself against this offensive! Help!
extra: Nice screen tan, you good-for-nothing... Maybe you should take a break.
siege: Clashing rows of steel, marching orders and fanfars resound! - And overall the thunder of the nearing troops. Fame is in the wind! Such a glorious day!
no_attack_1: This battle is none of my business. I have other battles to fight!
no_attack_2: I cannot stand by your side in this battle - but I will take advantage of this facourable situation and hamper with the fiend's supply lines!
no_help_1: My potential is currently rather limited. You must fight this battle alone.
no_help_2: It gives me pain to decline your plea - in case of your death, be assured I will take vengeance! I swear; on my honour!
no_sent: Regrettably the latest expeditions of conquest proved unseuccessful. I am low on stocks and have nothing to share with you.
sent: By chance I was able to... "bump into" the goods you asked for...
team_winning: Ha! I can sense it: this matte will prove child's play!
team_losing: I am reluctant to say so, my friend, but you are falling short of my expectations. Reinforce your efforts! We MUST prevail!
help_sent: Well, a few of my men will come to your aid.
will_attack: What an overbold plan! Ha! You know I cannot resist! See you on the battlefield!
